title: Claimant average weekly work hours
workHourLabel: Average weekly work hours provided on ET1
p1: It may help the tribunal if you can provide these detail. You will not be penalised for not providing it.

areClaimantWorkHourCorrect.label: Are the claimant’s average weekly work hours correct?

whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.label: What are the claimant’s correct average weekly work hours? (optional)
whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.hint: Enter the claimant’s average hours worked each week in digits.

whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.invalid: The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
whatAreClaimantCorrectWorkHour.exceeded: The average weekly work hours’ entered must be less than 168 hours
